content.html:
• I (finally) have a new job! On Tuesday I‚Äôm joining Altium, a leading electronics design software company, as VP Product & Engineering of its Nexar division in Cambridge.
  • I‚Äôve been introduced to the team this week over Zoom by CTO, Leigh, but Tuesday will be my first day in the office. I‚Äôve much to learn about the industry, but I‚Äôm feeling positive about using my experience with product and engineering teams to help my new colleagues.
  • I had stopped writing about my job search in these weeknotes a while ago. It‚Äôs taken far longer than I expected. The number of relevant, open, tech leadership roles has been very low, certainly the scarcest I‚Äôve experienced in my career. It‚Äôs been a painful process so it‚Äôs a huge relief to be able to move forward and get back to work.
  • The upturn in my fortunes coincided with a return to shorts weather. Sunshine makes everyone happier doesn‚Äôt it? Playing football in the park, walking to the shop to get ice creams, leaving the windows open to let in fresh air. All marvellous.
